scripts.db:migrate:local: CI=true wrangler d1 migrations apply vital-sensing-db-local --local || true
scripts.dev: npm run db:migrate:local && npx alchemy.run.ts --dev --stage local
scripts.deploy: npx alchemy deploy alchemy.run.ts --stage demo --profile maker-basic
scripts.destroy: npx alchemy destroy alchemy.run.ts --stage demo --profile maker-basic
